title: Every planar graph is the intersection graph of segments in the plane: extended abstract.
abstract: Given a set S of segments in the plane, the intersection graph of S is the graph with vertex set S in which two vertices are adjacent if and only if the corresponding two segments intersect. We prove a conjecture of Scheinerman (PhD Thesis, Princeton University, 1984) that every planar graph is the intersection graph of some segments in the plane.
